oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An invitation from Mr. and Mrs. Robert Wood Johnson to Mr. and Mrs. Bert Garner
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mr. and Mrs. Robert Wood Johnson;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Maryville (Tenn.); Johnson, Robert Wood; Invitation cards; Garner, Herbert Solomon; Philadelphia (Pa.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A card that was sent from Dr. Robert Wood Johnson, founder of Johnson and Johnson, to Mr. and Mrs. Bert Garner, in Maryville, Tennessee. The event of the invitation is unknown, but included the Johnson's daughter. It was sent from the Johnson's home in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
